content.question: What is the woman’s reaction to the man’s plans?

choices.label: She thinks that the school he will attend is better than hers.
She suggests that he study law.
She says that she is envious of his good luck.
She says that she would not make the same career choice.

content.answer: She says that she would not make the same career choice.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
